questions.question: Date of birth
questions.info: Your Date of birth is required to accurately calculate your health age

questions.question: On a scale of 1-10, with 10 being the highest, would you rate the following?
questions.subQuestion: The usual performance of most other workers in a job similar to yours

questions.question: Are there any other sources of stress not mentioned here that affect you?
questions.info: Knowing other work or non-work drivers of stress may help your organization implement practices to counter these factors

questions.question: How would you describe the balance between your work and non-work activities?
